name: Music Games :Magic Piano Tiles
description:
Become a real pianist now!
Game feature:
1. Simple graphics, easy to play and everybody gets playing the piano!
2. Top challenge mode gives you thrill and risk!
3. Share your record with your friends, and compare with world-wide players on the ranking list!
4. Finely-built online mode – connect with countless players all around the world. You can also invite your friends/enemies into a room and battle each other.
5. More challenge, more bonus and a better self.

Gaming mode: Don't tap the white tiles! Tap the black tiles according to the melody and don't miss any tile!

Support: 
If you have any question, please send it to bigdipperme@163.com, or you can go to the settings - help and support to contact us. We will solve your problem asap.
